mean_cn: adj. 兼职的，［哲］多元论的
mean_en: of or relating to the philosophical doctrine of pluralism
word_etyma: plural 复数的+ istic...的→ 兼职的；兼管数个教堂的
short_phrase: a pluralistic society with many different religions
sentence: In pluralistic societies, people of many different cultures live together in peace.
sentence_trans: 在多元论社会，多种不同文化的民族和谐共处。
